front.title: Interconnect Solution for EVPN Overlay networks

abstract.t: This document describes how Network Virtualization Overlays (NVO) can be connected to a Wide Area Network (WAN) in order to extend the layer-2 connectivity required for some tenants. The solution analyzes the interaction between NVO networks running EVPN and other L2VPN technologies used in the WAN, such as VPLS/PBB-VPLS or EVPN/PBB-EVPN, and proposes a solution for the interworking between both.
